events.description: Fernando Tatis Jr. singles on a sharp line drive to left fielder Corbin Carroll.
Juan Soto singles on a sharp ground ball to right fielder Jake McCarthy. Fernando Tatis Jr. to 3rd.

Padres challenged (tag play), call on the field was upheld: Manny Machado reaches on a fielder's choice out, first baseman Pavin Smith to third baseman Evan Longoria. Fernando Tatis Jr. out at 3rd. Juan Soto to 2nd. 1 out
